stages.title: DISCOVER
stages.description: Whether a new partner or a long-standing ally, we identify the strategic opportunity and ensure alignment before we begin.

backProcess.title: Marketing
backProcess.desc: Events Management, PR, SEO, GEO, Websites, Newsletters, Social Media

tdr.rule: Protect Revenue Velocity. Don't document relationship building; only document the container.
tdr.aiImplication: Automation here focuses on administrative offloading (e.g., Lead Scrapping, CRM data entry and enhancement, Proposals and Presentations automation...) rather than replacing the core task.

stages.title: DEFINE
stages.description: Our experts dig deep. We conduct the investigations needed to seek out the singular truth that powers your brand.

tdr.rule: The Deliverable IS the Document. We document methodology to ensure IP retention.
tdr.aiImplication: AI Agents. Since the "Rules" are written, AI Agents can draft strategy outlines, conduct competitive research, and summarize insights.

stages.title: DEVELOP
stages.description: We iterate, create, and design the core assets of the brand.

people.experts: Creative Directors and Subject Matter Experts
people.coordinators: Project Coordinators, Account Management and Creative Directors

tdr.rule: Protect the Magic. You cannot write an SOP for "having a good idea." Exempt 80% of the work.
tdr.aiImplication: Friction Removal. AI is used for mood-boarding and rapid prototyping. With established rules in place, AI can challenge the creative team to validate concepts against the brief before meetings are triggered, ensuring alignment without replacing the core creative spark.

stages.title: DELIVER
stages.description: We execute the final output with compliance, precision and deploy to the world.

people.coordinators: Production Manager, Print and Digital Producers, Project Coordinators, Account Management

tdr.rule: The Factory Floor. Processes must be documented for reproducibility and consistency.
tdr.aiImplication: Asset Scaling. Since specs are defined, AI handles bulk resizing, format adaptation, and file organization automatically.

stages.title: DYNAMIZE
stages.description: We analyze the win, gather feedback, and optimize for the next cycle.

people.experts: Subject Matter Experts and Executive Leaders

backProcess.title: Marketing
backProcess.desc: Use Cases, Private Events, PR and Blog Posts, Social Media Broadcasts

tdr.rule: Agile ROI. Document how we measure success to prove value, but keep feedback loops fast.
tdr.aiImplication: Predictive Analysis. AI processes feedback data to suggest optimization strategies for the next cycle.
